sentences.sentence: Surgical training takes at least nine years, or 11 in the case of obstetrics.
sentences.translation: 外科培训至少需要9年，产科则要11年。

sentences.sentence: She brought her children into the world at a time when obstetrics was a primitive art.
sentences.translation: 她生孩子的时候， 产科学还是一门原始医术。

sentences.sentence: American Journal of Obstetrics and Gynecology 2004.
